entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -17.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -19.2°C
Wind: SE 50 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Blizzard developing near midnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then snow and blowing snow. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
